Title: Advantages of strong mode coupling for suppression of nonlinear distortion in few-mode fibers
Source: Opt. Fiber Commun. Conf. Exhib., OFC
Abstract: © 2016 OSA.Nonlinear distortion in few-mode fibers for intermediate coupling is studied for the first time. Coupling strengths beyond -20 dB/100m give suppression of nonlinear distortion below the isolated mode without mode coupling.
SubjectAreas: Atomic and Molecular Physics, and Optics
